cont.entity_a: Compatible with glasses and have intuitive, useful features.

cont.entity_a: Metal strips can pull hairs and they may fall off if you bend over. Fragile feel but look good and sit lightly on the ears. Lightweight, stylish, and suitable for closed environments. Retro design, light, and have a lifetime warranty.
